titlestmt.titleproper: Xavier University Academic Program Review records
titlestmt.author: Thomas Kennealy, S.J..

publicationstmt.publisher: Xavier University Archives and Special Collections

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Tim McCabe using the OhioLINK EAD Application in 2014

did.head: Overview of the Collection

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Xavier University Archives and Special Collections

did.unittitle: Xavier University Academic Program Review records
did.abstract: This is a collection of program reviews submitted by Xavier University academic departments and offices as part of an overall review of the university in 2002-2003. These reviews were overseen by Dr. Mary Walker, Associate Vice President for Academic Affairs.

bioghist.head: History of the Academic Program Review
bioghist.p: The Academic Program Review was a university-wide study of academic departments and offices conducted in 2002-2003.

Each department and program was asked to supply information concerning its operations including its importance as it relates to the mission and vision of the university. The completed work of this review process was later used by the Xavier University Academic Planning Task Force to make a report judging the individual effectiveness of elements within the university community.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of the various reviews submitted to the Associate Vice President for Academic Affairs by Xavier academic departments and administrative offices.

arrangement.head: Statement of Arrangement
arrangement.p: The materials in this collection are arranged into the following general categories:

list.item: Academic Program Review: Williams College of Business
Academic Program Review: College of Arts and Sciences
Academic Program Review: College of Social Sciences

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: For related documents, see also Xavier University Archives collections for the Planning Steering Committee (2002-03), found in Inactive Committee Records, XUA-36 and the Academic Planning Task Force records (XUA-46).

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: Restricted access. Please contact the Xavier University Archives staff.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Box Number, Folder Number, XUA-47, Academic Program Review records, Special Collections and University Archives, Xavier University Library, Cincinnati, Ohio.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.

scopecontent.p: Program reviews included in this Division of Mission & Ministry report are Ignatian Programs, Campus Ministry, Peace & Justice Programs, Service Fellowships, Mission & Ministry Internships, and Spirit Celebration.
